Bash(.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1 -Json "Phase 3: AI-Powered Todo Chatbot \(integrated with Phase 2 full-stack app\)

Generate full specification for Phase 3 following hackathon document exactly.

Key Rules:
- No manual coding â€” all code generated by Claude Code from refined specs.
- Implement conversational interface using OpenAI ChatKit \(frontend UI\), OpenAI Agents SDK \(AI logic\), and Official MCP SDK \(MCP server for tools\).
- Bot manages user''s Todo list via natural language \(e.g., ""Add task buy groceries tomorrow"", ""Reschedule my morning meetings to 2 PM"", ""Mark all work tasks complete""\).
- Bot retains conversation context \(via database\), handles multi-step commands, asks clarifications, confirms destructive actions.
- Stateless chat endpoint \(FastAPI POST /api/{user_id}/chat\) â€” persists state in Neon DB \(Conversation + Message models\).
- MCP tools: add_task, list_tasks, complete_task, delete_task, update_task \(as per doc spec\).
- Integrate with Phase 2 backend API \(use authenticated calls with JWT token from Better Auth\).
- Only basic CRUD via chat â€” no recurring tasks, priorities, due dates reminders yet.
- Chat UI in Next.js frontend \(responsive, streaming responses if possible\).
- Reusable intelligence \(sub-agents/skills from Phase 2 can be reused for bonus points\).

Output format:
- Create folder specs/003-ai-chatbot/ if missing
- Generate and save these .md files with exact content based on doc:
  - overview.md \(phase goal, success metrics, in-scope/out-of-scope\)
  - architecture.md \(updated diagram from doc: ChatKit UI â†’ FastAPI Chat Endpoint â†’ OpenAI Agents SDK â†’ MCP Server â†’ Phase 2 API â†’ Neon DB\)
  - features/chatbot.md \(conversational interface, natural language commands, context retention, clarification loop, confirmation, error handling\)
  - agents.md \(OpenAI Agents SDK + MCP SDK tools, main agent, sub-agents/skills for CRUD\)
  - prompts.md \(system prompt for todo management bot, safety rails, tool calling examples\)
  - api-integration.md \(how agents call Phase 2 REST endpoints with JWT token\)
  - database/chat.md \(Conversation and Message models, stateless server benefits\)
  - ui/chat.md \(ChatKit setup, chat UI component in Next.js, streaming, message bubbles\)
  - non-functional.md \(rate limiting, cost considerations, privacy, no task data in LLM prompt unless necessary\)

Be brutally specific, opinionated, use tables/bullets heavily.
Use Phase 2 JWT auth \(token from Better Auth session passed to agents\).
No advanced features \(recurring, priorities, due dates\) in Phase 3.
Bonus consideration: Reusable sub-agents/skills from Phase 2, Urdu support, voice input.

Generate all files now, commit with ""Phase 3: Full specification files generated from sp.specify""." --json --number 1 --short-name "ai-chatbot")
